newsitem.title: THAILAND: THAILAND'S THANONG, CHAIYAWAT TO APPEAR ON TV.
newsitem.headline: THAILAND'S THANONG, CHAIYAWAT TO APPEAR ON TV.

text.p: Thai Finance Minister Thanong Bidaya and central bank governor Chaiyawat Wibulswasdi will appear on national television on Thursday at around 8.30 pm (1330 GMT), finance ministry officials said.
Officials did not say what they were going to discuss, but the market expected them to clarify the government's decision to enter the IMF programme and the VAT hike due to take effect on Saturday.
They were also likely to touch on a widely debated issue of government plans to cut the 1997/8 fiscal budget by between 50 to 75 billion baht ($1.6 to $2.4 billion).
They may also field questions from the public.
